metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9242 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The __ip6_append_data function in net/ipv6/ip6_output.c in the Linux kernelthrough 4.11.3 is too late in checking whether an overwrite of an skb datastructure may occur, which allows local users to cause a denial of service(system crash) via crafted system calls.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9242` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-83-generic - 4.4.0-83.106
linux-image-4.4.0-83-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-83.106
linux-image-4.4.0-83-lowlatency - 4.4.0-83.106
linux-image-4.4.0-83-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-83.106
linux-image-4.4.0-83-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-83.106
linux-image-4.4.0-83-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-83.106
linux-image-4.4.0-83-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-83.106
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-83-generic - 4.4.0-83.106
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1061-raspi2 - 4.4.0-1061.69
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1063-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1063.68
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1022-aws - 4.4.0-1022.31
No subscription required

linux-image-4.8.0-58-generic - 4.8.0-58.63~16.04.1
linux-image-4.8.0-58-generic-lpae - 4.8.0-58.63~16.04.1
linux-image-4.8.0-58-lowlatency - 4.8.0-58.63~16.04.1
linux-image-extra-4.8.0-58-generic - 4.8.0-58.63~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1018-gke - 4.4.0-1018.18
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1018-gke - 4.4.0-1018.18
No subscription required

linux-image-4.11.0-1009-azure - 4.11.0-1009.9
linux-image-extra-4.11.0-1009-azure - 4.11.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-4.10.0-1004-gcp - 4.10.0-1004.4
linux-image-extra-4.10.0-1004-gcp - 4.10.0-1004.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-83.106').
